bio: Resident OptiMaxi. I use and promote Optimism blockchain.
contributionDescription: I tweet, retweet and promote Optimism on my twitter and in the Discord communities I am involved in, as well as the airdrop guides that I publish. I like the technology and the projects on Optimism and continue to use them regardless of market conditions.
impactDescription: I am constantly promoting Optimism through twitter, discord and substack. I work with a lot of noobs and steer them in the right direction to be successful in their crypto journeys. I will continue to use Optimism and make sure all of my followers know the benefits of the ecosystem.
pwCategorySuggestions: Community Building, User Experience & Adoption, Developer Ecosystem, Smart Contract Platforms, Social Media Promotion
